title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Organizational Sustainability Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management knowledge and foundational understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: Providing sustainability education combined with language domains for current practitioners, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create diagnostic reports utilizing at least three types of organizational sustainability assessment indicators.
Learners can propose at least two improvement plans for organizational operations reflecting ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) principles.
Learners can explain five or more practical strategies for reducing carbon emissions.

resources: Mobile Quiz Platform Compatible with Smartphones
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
